channel.title: Posts on Aaron Tian
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on Aaron Tian

item.title: First Post
item.description: Hi I’m Aaron, an undergraduate student at the University of Pennyslvania and this is my first post on my website! If you want to learn more about me, feel free to check out my about page. I’ll be using this website to showcase my personal projects and maybe do some technical blog posts about the things I make.
item.content:
Hi I’m Aaron, an undergraduate student at the University of Pennyslvania and this is my first post on my website! If you want to learn more about me, feel free to check out my about page.

I’ll be using this website to showcase my personal projects and maybe do some technical blog posts about the things I make.
